title: Yell - Yellow Pages UK
summary: Yell Local Search ‚Äì Find local UK businesses
description: Yell is the UK‚Äôs leading online business directory and you can find millions of local businesses right from the App. Whether you‚Äôre looking for a restaurant in Leeds, a plumber in Basingstoke, or a doctor in Edinburgh, we‚Äôve got everything you need and more‚Ä¶- Browse business listings with phone numbers, addresses, directions, opening hours, photos, videos, and more.- Make your decision based on millions of reviews left by the Yell community.- Help your favourite local businesses get discovered by more people in your area by leaving your own ratings & reviews.- Add local businesses to your favourites list to quickly access them from the favourites tab at any point.- View your results on a full screen list or map, and easily find the best, or the closest results with our quick sort functionality.- Quickly call any business from the results list.Yellow Pages was first published in 1966 and for many years has been a popular way for consumers to search and find local businesses. descriptionHTML:
Yell is the UK’s leading online business directory and you can find millions of local businesses right from the App. Whether you’re looking for a restaurant in Leeds, a plumber in Basingstoke, or a doctor in Edinburgh, we’ve got everything you need and more…

- Browse business listings with phone numbers, addresses, directions, opening hours, photos, videos, and more.

- Make your decision based on millions of reviews left by the Yell community.

- Help your favourite local businesses get discovered by more people in your area by leaving your own ratings & reviews.

- Add local businesses to your favourites list to quickly access them from the favourites tab at any point.

- View your results on a full screen list or map, and easily find the best, or the closest results with our quick sort functionality.

- Quickly call any business from the results list.

Yellow Pages was first published in 1966 and for many years has been a popular way for consumers to search and find local businesses.
Now, the Yell App gives you the power to find popular local businesses quickly and conveniently, around your current location or a town or city of your choice.
comments: Does exactly what it says on the tin üòÅ
Where is the add to calendar function?

This is a useful app but you can't always rely on it to find the nearest business. I was 1/2 mile from a b&q but the nearest it found was over 7 miles away. After the new update wanted my identity I decided to uninstall it. To be honest a Google search will find as much or more info on local businesses as Yell does.
Useless since the upgrade... :( need the map to show local competition... No longer available since last upgrade. Will therefore no longer use :(
recentChanges: This is just a small release with a few bug fixes.

As always, If you love the App then please feel free to leave us a good review on the Play Store. If you notice something that looks wrong or there's anything you'd like us to take a look at, please do get in touch directly by emailing us: apps@yell.com
